name: Fetch
description: Fetch is a dog dating app that allows users to create a profile and place it on a local map.

name: Note Taker
description: This app allows you to create, save, and delete notes

name: Eat The Burger
description: An app that allows users to make 'burgers' and 'devour' them. Uses Node, Express, and Handlebars

name: In Or Out
description: An app for food lovers. It uses the Yelp API and a Recipe API to give users dining inspiration to cook or order

name: README.md CLI App
description: An app that uses Inquirer to allow users to make a basic README.md with little to no headache

name: Password Generator
description: A random password generator using JavaScript
